projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xmlfile.

div.p:
rājamăṅśa, bhaḍavaṅ, baniṅ , karuṁ puliḥ, karuṁ matiṅ gantuṅan·, Asu sər·, vḍus guntiṁ, muvaḥ mnanarabya ḍayaṁ aṁñjama
ha kavulenakvakən·, Uṅśirəniṁ strī laraṅan·, Aṅluputaknāmuk·, Uṅśirəniṁ maliṁ tləs·,

kunəṁ Ikaṅ asambyāvahāra dravya sa
masānak i saḍaṁ, hiniṅanan kveḥ kḍiknya, roṁ pikul sasuhun ri sasambyāvahāra, Akacapuri, Acaraki, pamada-pada
n·, Ahiliran·, 2, banava, 1, saha tuṇḍan·, Abaśanā, Atitiḥ, Amutər, Apaṇḍe vsi, Apaṇḍe mās·, Apa
ṇḍe ḍaḍap·, Apaṇḍe siṅya-siṅyan·, Apaṇḍe kavat·, Apaṇḍe gaṁśa, Apaṇḍe tamra, Apaṇḍe pəṭak·, Apaṇḍe
daṅ·, paḍa roṅ gusalī sovaṁ, yan paṅulaṁ kbo, 20, kbonya, yan paṅulaṁ sapi, 40, sapinya, yan paṅulaṁ celeṁ
savurugan celeṅanya, yan paṅulaṁ vḍus·, 80, vḍusanya, yan paṅulaṅ itik·, savanteyan itikanya, kunə:ṁ yan lə
viḥ paṅiṅan iriya, knana dravya haji de saṁ makətranya,

sampun tlas labdha pagə:ḥ paṅadəg saṁ hyaṁ rājapra
śasti, maṅhaturakən ta rakryān aṅreh, nāma puṣpadevaka kili vidyā, mapasəṅgahan sira pāduka rājavaṅśa, mvaṁ rakryā
n aileṁ, makasi-kasir goleṁ pahat·, mapañji makaharṣa, mapasəṅgahan narāryya vaṅśarāja, pirak·, kā 1, sū 5,
pamujā I pāduka śrĭ mahārāja, muvaḥ rakryān apatiḥ, rakryān dmuṁ, rakryān kañuruhan·, pada Inaṅsyə:n
pasək pagə̄h pirak·, su 4, sovaṁ, tan kavuntat saṁ nayapati, saṁ prăṇarāja, saṅ śatyaguṇa, saṅ apañji niratmāka,
paḍa Ianaṅsyə:n pasək pagə:h, pirak·, sū 1, mā 4, sovaṁ, muvaḥ saṁ pamgət i tirvan·, saṅ pamgət iṁ jamba, sa ṁ pamgə
t i raṇu kabayan·, saṅ pamgət iṁ pamvatan·, saṅ pamgət iṅ kaṇḍamuhi, pu padələgan·, paḍa Inaṅsyə:n pirak mā 10,
